short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly copy the link to any Azure DevOps work item
short.pl: Szybkie kopiowanie łącza do dowolnego elementu roboczego usługi Azure DevOps
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Copie rapidamente o link para qualquer item de trabalho do Azure DevOps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Azure DevOps Fast Copy extension displays a link image next to each work item's number and clicking on the image will copy the link to the work item to your clipboard. Also allows you to Share with Teams.
long.pl,pt_BR,pt_PT: Azure DevOps Fast Copy extension displays a link image next to each work item's number and clicking on the image will copy the link to the work item to your clipboard.
